pack.omni.name: omniversal voyage
item.omni.knife_of_envy.description: hold the knife_of_envy in your main hand, to use
item.omni.detonator.description: a detonator used to trigger the explosion of a bomb
item.omni.yangian.description: the yangian, a chestplate that allows you to harness the power of the sun, granting you increased strength and fire resistance
item.omni.electro_strike_helmet.descript: the electro strike helmet, a helmet that allows you to harness the power of electricity, granting you increased speed and flight
itemgroup.omni.omniversal_voyage_tab.des: a tab for all the items in the omniversal voyage addon
